data.oai_dc:dc: This file contains 4 data sets used to apply extreme value functions to infer the probability and extent of very long dispersal distance events.

Block maxima|extreme value analyses (EVA)|fat-tailed kernels|Generalized Extreme Value distribution (GEV)|Generalized Pareto distribution (GP)|long-distance dispersal (LDD)|maximal dispersal distance|seed rain|peak over a threshold
